channel.title: What should i add into my server rep++
channel.description: if i have it added already ill just say if you put a good idea in then ill rep ++

item.title: What should i add into my server rep++
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“liamp, post:3, topic:424831”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=527495.msg3845176#msg3845176 date=1323559717]
First of all, I don’t want rep (but its nice you said).
A server must have its own uniqueness, otherwise it’s considered “just like everyone else.”
I was thinking when making my own server that I could make a phone, that would replace the friends list, or teleport me around, and etc.
You could make other things, such as a place, like a labratory that has monsters hiding and they come out of nowhere and attack the player. It’s difficulty could be rated HARD.
Just use your imagination and put determination and you will make the best of servers.
[/quote]
good idea but ill need a model person to make the phone model[/quote]
Make the model from a tutorial, basicully you just need 4 lines and fill it in with black or so.

Read full topic
item.source: What should i add into my server rep++

item.title: What should i add into my server rep++
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

First of all, I don’t want rep (but its nice you said).
A server must have its own uniqueness, otherwise it’s considered “just like everyone else.”
I was thinking when making my own server that I could make a phone, that would replace the friends list, or teleport me around, and etc.
You could make other things, such as a place, like a labratory that has monsters hiding and they come out of nowhere and attack the player. It’s difficulty could be rated HARD.
Just use your imagination and put determination and you will make the best of servers.
